5.3 DUIM-Sheets Module

port-name

Generic function

Summary

Returns the name of the specified port.

Signature

port-name port => name

Arguments

port
An instance of type <port>.

Values

name
An instance of type <object>.

Library

duim-sheets

Module

duim-sheets

Description

Returns the name of port.

See also

port-modifier-state, page 331

port-pointer, page 333

port-server-path, page 333

port-type, page 334

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
